pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(a)Automation is key!$()$(li)$(a)Always craft extras.$()$(li)No more capturing Ghasts for the $(n)Angel Ring$()!$(li)Go through the Controls. Lots of mods have features that need to be bound to a key.$(li)$(a)Never spend 6 minutes doing something by hand when you can spend 6 hours to automate it.$()

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(3)Mekanism Cables$() tend to cause lag, be careful not to overuse them.$(li)Press $(l)Backspace$() to go to the previous recipe in JEI.$(li)Instead of using filled $(n)buckets$() in recipes, you can use filled $(n)Portable Tanks$() for batch crafting.$(li)Beware the effects of poor $(2)nutrition$() (Hotkey N). Seemingly random debuffs can stem from a bad diet.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)To loot a dragon, $(l)right-click$() it with an empty hand.$(li)Keep your $(n)item cables$() short. Not only does it speed up the overall transfer, it is also easier on the server.$(li)Use $(l)F7$() to see the light levels, $(l)F9$() to see the chunk borders, and $(l)Ctrl+B$() to see the biome borders.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)Press $(l)Shift/Sneak$() over your grave to retrieve your items.$(li)Holding the $(o)Drawer Key$() in your off-hand will automatically lock a newly placed Storage Drawer.$(li)The Immersive Petroleum $(n)Pumpjack$() needs an Immersive Engineering $(n)Fluid Pipe$() to bedrock to function.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(n)Mob Spawners$() can be moved by using a $(n)Drop Of Evil$() on them, or by carrying them. ($(l)Shift + Right-Click$() by default)$(li)$(l)Starlight Transmutation$() gives you access to $(n)End Stone$() without ever going to The End.$(li)You can put the Astral Sorcery $(n)Linking Wand$() in your offhand, and it won't stop linking.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(6)/xu_powersharing$() allows you to share Extra Utilities $(4)Grid Power$() with anyone on your server.$(li)$(6)/foodlist size$() shows you how many different foods you already ate.$(li)$(6)/undo_excavation$() can undo $(6)Ore Excavator$()$(li)$(6)/wandOops$() can undo the $(6)Better Builder's Wand$()

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Astral Sorcery Rituals$() (and linked Ritual Anchors) act as $(l)Chunkloaders$().$(li)$(l)Horologium$() only appears every 36 days, the night after a $(l)Solar Eclipse$().$(li)$(5)Mystical Agriculture$() plants have a 5%% chance of dropping $(5)2 seeds$() when harvested with left click.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)There are many different valid fuels for the Tinkers' Construct $(n)Smeltery$(), all with different attributes.$(li)$(n)Pile of Ashes$() from the Nether are a great early game fuel source.$(li)The $(n)Akashic Tome$() is a portable bookshelf capable of holding all of your informational books and guides.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)A 13x13x13 $(n)Compact Machine$() is large enough for all of your $(d)Thaumcraft$() needs, and will prevent flux from spreading to your base.$(li)Growing $(n)Sugar Cane$() on $(o)Fertile Soil$() or $(o)Fertilized Dirt$() does not require an adjacent water source.$(li)Under NO circumstances activate $(l)Veinminer$() while working around $(l)AE2 networks$()!

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Mob Farms$() will lag less if spread out over a large area. The main load comes from mobs pathing away from each other.$(li)$(2)NuclearCraft$() machines automatically convert Mekanism $(6)gasses$() into their fluid forms, and vice-versa.$(li)Utilize the $(l)Quark chest buttons$() in your inventory! They help a lot with early game storage management.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)Applied Energistics $(n)Interfaces$() are grouped together by their name in the $(n)Interface Terminal$() (can be named in an anvil).$(li)The $(n)Advanced Omniwand$() (Omniwand crafted with 4 gears) is a good way to get all wrenches early. It also helps to keep your inventory neat.$(li)$(n)Drawers$() can be accessed via the Cooking For Blockheads $(n)Floor$().

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)A $(n)Skeleton$() that falls in Witch Water becomes a $(n)Wither Skeleton$(). $(n)Squid$() -> $(n)Ghast$().$(li)$(n)Cursed Earth$() spawns $(n)Wither Skeletons$() in $(l)Nether Fortress$()es.$(li)$(n)Ender Lily$() grows faster on End Stone. Get it in $(n)Stone Barrel$()s.$(li)Hover over an item and press $(l)Y$() to show it in nearby $(n)Chest$()s.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)A stack of $(n)Steeleaves$() in your hotbar will dramatically fast repair with the $(a)Synergy$() trait$(li)$(n)Building Gadgets$() can take items from ME network. Just $(l)shift-right-click$() on a $(n)Security Terminal$() with the gadget.$(li)The $(n)Maim Trap$() from Dark Utilities is the best way to kill mobs on high $(5)difficulty$().

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)The Ice Bomb from Twilight Forest turns even flowing $(n)Lava$() into $(n)Obsidian$().$(li)Press $(l)Shift+F$() to lock stairs rotation.$(li)You can $(l)shear$() Creepers.$(li)6+ mods support $(2)JEI dragging$() for item filters, just like $(l)EnderIO$().$(li)[MP] Hover over an item in a GUI and press $(l)Shift+T$() to show it in chat.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)[MP] $(l)Crouch + right-click$() another player to give them an item.$(li)[MP] Hold $(l)F4$() to ping a block.$(li)$(b)PSI Energy$() restores when you gather $(a)XP$().$(li)Calm down the fastest tool by press "$(l)\$()".$(li)Press "$(l)Shift+F8$()" to refresh your sound device.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(n)Fluid Tank$() from Ender IO - When trashing items in $(6)lava$(), a tiny amount of more $(6)lava$() will be produced.$(li)$(n)Carry on$() mob spawner trigger more mobs to spawn.$(li)Game stages don't actually prohibit anything.$(li)Full $(n)Backpacks$() in AE2 system cause lags, or even $(5)cant be taken out$().$(li)$(n)Industrial Wires$() - cheapest way to convert between RF and EU.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(n)Ctrl+Delete$() trashes item from inventory.$(li)$(n)Inventory System Storage$() can't be accessed directly, but work with hoppers and VAULTOPIC$(li)Right-Click $(n)Openblock's Tank$() with Liquid XP to receive experience.$(li)Want $(8)/home$() command? Craft $(n)Stable Ender Pearl$() + $(n)Chat Detector$()!$(li)Putting a Fluid Bus on an IE Fluid Tank $(4)causes lag$()

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)Use $(5)Horologrium$() stasis to kill the $(8)Chaos Guardian$()$(li)$(0)Nocturnal Powder$() can be used to spawn rare mobs such as $(o)Blizz$()$(li)Blood Magic $(n)Teleposers$() allow for easy long-range transportation of Botania $(b)Mana Pools$() and Astral Temple $(b)Crystals$(). Even works with Sparks!

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(n)/integrateddynamics networkdiagnostics$() is great to find out what exactly you did with ID that's destroying $(4)TPS$()$(li)$(l)Need Vis?$() Place the $(n)Arcane Workbench$() in the $(2)Twilight Forest$()!$(li)$(o)Environmental Tech$() multiblocks can $(l)share blocks$()!$(li)$(n)Heads$() with NBT tags in ME terminal cause FPS lag$(li)Press "$(l)Shift+C$()" to crawl

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)The OP command $(n)/bcore_util regenchunk$() regenerates the entire chunk.$(li)Use the command $(n)/tmg_deathlist [TAB] [TAB]$() to assist in locating your grave.$(li)$(b)Splash Water Bottle$() can extinguish entities on fire.$(li)Press "$(l)R$()" or "$(l)U$()" while hovering over an item in the $(2)Patchouli$() book to view its recipes.

pages.title: Tips
pages.text: $(li)You can $(6)deconstruct TCon tools$() by placing them into output slot.
